name: old-gateau
effect: Used on a party Pokémon : Cures any status ailment and confusion.
short_effect: Cures any status ailment and confusion.

flavor_text.black_white: Old Chateau’s hidden specialty. It heals all the status problems of a single Pokémon.
flavor_text.black_2_white_2: Old Chateau’s hidden specialty. It heals all the status problems of a single Pokémon.
